OOC:  You don;t have to say what is damaged jsut say like like 
"the shots hit pika in the side causing him to stagger to the side" 
or something like that. you dont have too it jsut makes it easier to 
roleplay when you do....

BIC: 
Ultimo Campeon takes to the air again over the ice beam then flies 
straight at Dark Pika 
"Berrete"

"Online"

A large dagger protruded from the end of the gun.  The dagger was 
pure energy with shape.  He flew at Dark Pika the blade aiming for 
Dark Pika's neck.
